text: Asiria kini ne'moka, sipisipi afute kva vahekamo'zane, eri'za vahekamo'zanena zamavu mase'naze. Ana hu'nazage'za sipisipi afute kva vahe omani'negeno sipisipi afutamimo agona agona panani huno freankna hu'za, kagri vahe'mo'za panani hu'za ufre efre hu'naze. Ana hu'nazankino mago vahe'mo zamazeri tru hugara osu'ne.
